titles.title: Bless God, You've Given Me A Wonderful Family

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bless God, You've given me a wonderful family.
I can't express the love I'm feeling inside,
To look around me at all of the brothers
Fathers and mothers You have given me.
One of a city, two of a family,
How be it God, You have chosen me.
But for Your grace I would be in the mire,
But on the rock You have established me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dios me ha dado una hermosa familia
No puedo expresar el amor que siento en mí
Al mirar a todos mis padres y madres
Hermanos que me diste a mi.
Uno del pueblo, dos de cada familia
Que bueno es que me escogiste a mi
Si no fuera por tu gracia estaría en el lodo
Más en la roca me estableciste a mi.
